# Set up functions

```{r funcs, message = FALSE}


get_s1 = function(counts_all , eigens_all , counts_subset , eigens_subset){
  V11 = colVars(counts_all %*% eigens_all)
  V12 = colVars(counts_all %*% eigens_subset)
  V21 = colVars(counts_subset %*% eigens_all)
  V22 = colVars(counts_subset %*% eigens_subset)
  
  S1 = 2*sum((V11 - V21)^2 + (V12 - V22)^2)
  S2 = sum((V11 + V22 - V12 - V21)^2)
  S3 = sum((V11 + V12 - V21 - V22)^2)
  out = list(s1 = S1 , s2 = S2 , s3 = S3)
  return(out)
}

get_eigenvectors_reverse = function(sce , genes , batch = "sample" , nPC = 100){
  counts = as.matrix(logcounts(sce[genes,]))
  pcs = prcomp_irlba(counts , n = nPC)
  eigen_vectors = pcs$rotation  
  rownames(eigen_vectors) = colnames(sce)
  return(eigen_vectors)
}

  

```

## SCMER

```{r read-selection-scmer, message = FALSE}


# batched
scmer_batched.files = list.files(path = paste0( root.dir , "data/scmer_res_selected/" , system , "/batched/" ))
n_genes = sapply(scmer_batched.files , function(str) str_replace_all(str,  ".txt" , ""))
n_genes = sapply(n_genes , function(str) str_replace_all(str,  "nGenes_" , ""))
n_genes = sort(as.numeric(n_genes))

genes_scmer_batched = lapply(n_genes , function(str){
  out = read.table(paste0( root.dir , "data/scmer_res_selected/" , system , "/batched/nGenes_" , str , ".txt") , header = F)
  genes = out$V1
  return(genes)
})

# unbatched
```

# Prob-matrix all

```{r prob-matrix-all, message = FALSE}


counts_all = as.matrix(logcounts(sce))
eigens_all = get_eigenvectors_reverse(sce , rownames(sce) , batch = "sample" , nPC = 100)


```

## Alsu VS scmer-batched

```{r kl-vs-scmer-batched, message = FALSE}


genes = lapply(1:length(genes_scmer_batched) , function(i){
  current.genes_scmer = genes_scmer_batched[[i]]
  n_genes = length(current.genes_scmer)
  out = list("alsu" = as.character(genes_alsu[1:n_genes]) , "scmer_batched" = as.character(current.genes_scmer) , "hvgs" = as.character(get_hvgs(sce , n = n_genes)))
  return(out)
})

stat_scmer_batched = bplapply( 1:length(genes) , function(i){
  current.genes = genes[[i]]
  stat.per_n_genes = lapply(1:length(current.genes) , function(j){
    current.sce = sce[current.genes[[j]] , ]
    counts_subset = as.matrix(logcounts(current.sce))
    eigens_subset = get_eigenvectors_reverse(sce , current.genes[[j]] , batch = "sample" , nPC = 100)
    s_stat = get_s1(counts_all , eigens_all , counts_subset , eigens_subset)
    out = data.frame( type = names(current.genes)[j] , n_genes = length(current.genes[[j]]) , s1 = s_stat$s1 , s2 = s_stat$s2 , s3 = s_stat$s3 )
    return(out)
  })
  stat.per_n_genes = do.call(rbind , stat.per_n_genes)
  return(stat.per_n_genes)
}, BPPARAM = mcparam)
stat_scmer_batched = do.call(rbind , stat_scmer_batched)
saveRDS(stat_scmer_batched , file = paste0(root.dir , "data/benchmark/S_metric/" , system , "/S__scmer_batched.Rds"))


```
